title: Changing region help
body:
Hello,

I was wondering, If I was to change region would i still keep the season rewards etc like the banner on my profile and the banner in the loading screen??

Thanks.

replies.body: If i was to change after the new season when the placement matches are would i still have the hidden MMR?

Yes, you'll keep your rewards from the previous seasons.

I'd suggest you read through this super helpful FAQ so you know what happens when you transfer: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ
